titleStmt.title: here begynneth a treatyse called. Peruula
"Parvula"
titleStmt.author: Stanbridge, John, 1463-1510, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Caxtons hous by wynkyn de worde,

notesStmt.note: In this edition, text begins: What shalt thou doo when ye haste an englyssh to be made in latyne.
Imprint from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Identified as STC 19439 on UMI microfilm reel 20..
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
